MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB250201108
Licensee Name: Ennis Center for Children Inc
Licensee Address: 20100 Greenfield Road
Detroit, MI 48235
Licensee Telephone #: (313) 342-2699
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Robert Ennis, Designee
Name of Facility: Ennis Center for Children - Flint
Facility Address: 129 E. Third
Flint, MI 48502
Facility Telephone #: (810) 233-4031
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Ennis Center for Children – Flint has requested to open a satellite office located at
3099 Cabaret Trail, Saginaw, Michigan 48603.
III. Methodology
An on-site tour of this office was conducted on September 30, 2020.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The office is located in a one story building. There is adequate staff, visitor, and
handicapped parking available. There is a reception area, lobby, visitor
restrooms and emergency exit doors. Past the reception area, there is a secure
door leading to a hallway that extends to administrative staff offices, a large
training/conference room, family visitation rooms, a therapy room, a kitchen, and
restrooms for staff. A secure file room with lockable cabinets will house the client
files and confidential CHRI information.
V. Recommendation
I recommend this agency continue its current licensing status with approval of this
satellite office in Saginaw, Michigan.
October 5, 2020
________________________________________
Alicia Wiggins Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
October 7, 2020
